article_title: Drug Discount Program Drives up Costs, Discounts the Poor

article_metadata.description: American cancer patients have never had a better chance of beating the disease than they do today. In the last quarter-century, cancer death rates have declined by more than one-fifth. But these gains in the fight against cancer haven't come cheaply. Cancer drug prices have doubled in the past decade. Overall [...]
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes
